title: New property for creating a single page of a content type
description: Create a single page for a content type with the new `isSingleton` property, ensuring consistency and preventing duplication of layout updates.

title: New property for creating setting-only content types
description: Create settings-only content types with the new onlySettings property, ideal for non-storefront content like SEO pages.

title: New Calendar Views to manage Releases
description: Upgrade release planning with improved Calendar Views. Easily manage planned releases through Monthly, Weekly, and Daily Views in Releases module.

title: Introducing Media Admin
description: : Discover a new way to upload, organize, and manage all your digital assets with the new Media Admin app.

title: VTEX Headless CMS previews now available for Base Store (Next.js)
description: Use the Preview option while writing a draft on VTEX Headless CMS to preview content changes immediately and whenever you want.

title: FastStore - August, 2022
description: Gift, OrderSummary, SkuSelector, and CartItem components are now available in the FastStore UI. Also, updates to the FastStore API improve the shopping cart UX and allow adding user's session information to the orderForm.

title: New environment flag improves deploy cache use
description: WebOps can now reuse cache from previous commits in newer deploy previews. This is because of a new environment flag you can set in the `vtex.env` file of your FastStore project: `USE_BUILD_CACHE`.

title: Preview deploys are now on GitHub environments
description: The automatic previews of your FastStore project's pull requests are now deployed with GitHub environments.
